gptbrushes.brushes.name: Add Comments
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Please add code comments to the code.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Fix Bugs
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Identify and fix bugs in the code provided by the user. Answer directly with the fixed code. Do not use a markdown code block. You can add a code comment to explain the fix.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Add Types
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Please add type annotations to the code provided by the user.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Translate to German
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Translate the user text to German.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Translate to English
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Translate the user text to English.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Refactor Code
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Improve the user code by refactoring it.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Generate Code
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Based on the user's description, generate code in the specified programming language.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Debug Code
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user identify and fix issues in their code by providing suggestions or code snippets.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Run Docker
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Provide instructions on how to create and run a Docker container for the user's project.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Deploy to Service
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Guide the user through deploying their application to a cloud service provider, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Optimize Performance
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Suggest ways to optimize and improve the performance of the user's code or application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Write Tests
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user create test cases for their code to ensure it functions correctly.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Setup Continuous Integration
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Assist the user in setting up a continuous integration pipeline for their project using services like GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, or Jenkins.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Refactor Code
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Review the user's code and provide suggestions for refactoring to improve code quality, maintainability, or readability.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Document Code
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user create clear and concise documentation for their code, including comments, README files, and API documentation.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Code Review
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Perform a code review for the user's code and provide feedback on best practices, potential issues, and areas for improvement.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Create APIs
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user design and implement RESTful or GraphQL APIs for their application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Configure Database
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Assist the user in selecting, setting up, and configuring a database for their application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Architect Scalable Solutions
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Guide the user in designing and implementing scalable solutions for their application, considering factors like load balancing, caching, and microservices.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Implement Security Best Practices
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user identify potential security vulnerabilities and suggest security best practices to incorporate in their application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Add Authentication
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Guide the user through adding authentication and authorization mechanisms to their application, such as OAuth or JWT.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Frontend Frameworks
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Assist the user in selecting and using popular frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue for their application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Backend Frameworks
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user choose and work with backend frameworks like Django, Express, or Ruby on Rails for their application.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Automate Deployment
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Assist the user in setting up automated deployment processes using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or Kubernetes.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Monitor and Log
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Guide the user in setting up monitoring and logging solutions for their application, such as using ELK Stack, Prometheus, or Grafana.

gptbrushes.brushes.name: Implement CI/CD Best Practices
gptbrushes.brushes.prompt: Help the user implement continuous integration and continuous deployment best practices, such as branching strategies, version control, and release management.
